TRttiObjectHelper Class Helper

Summary

Represents type TRttiObjectHelper.

Namespace: Spring.Helpers
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TRttiObjectHelper = class helper for TRttiObject
 end;
Methods
 NameDescription
GetCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass)

Overloaded. Represents method GetCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass).

GetCustomAttribute<T>

Overloaded. Enumerates all applied custom attributes and returns the first one which is/inherits the specified type.

GetCustomAttributes(TAttributeClass)

Overloaded. Represents method GetCustomAttributes(TAttributeClass).

GetCustomAttributes<T>

Overloaded. Gets an array which contains all custom attribute types which the type applies.

HasCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass)

Overloaded. Represents method HasCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass).

HasCustomAttribute<T>

Overloaded. Determines whether the type applies the specified custom attribute class.

TryGetCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass,TCustomAttribute)

Overloaded. Represents method TryGetCustomAttribute(TAttributeClass,TCustomAttribute).

TryGetCustomAttribute<T>(T)

Overloaded. Try getting a custom attribute class which is applied by the type.
